This is my R markdown file.

Loading Pacakges:
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
```

loading data:
```{r}
data <- read.csv("raw_data/data.csv")
```

Plotting the data:
I have decided to plot weight on the x axis and temperature on the y axis.
```{r}
ggplot(data=data, aes(x=weight, y=TempC))+geom_point()+geom_abline()
```

I can do the same for volume of 02 which produces a lineaer relationship
```{r}
ggplot(data=data, aes(y=VO2_ml_per_h, x=weight))+geom_point()+geom_abline()
````
